item.title: Katie add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Tell people there's an invisible man in the sky who created the universe, and the vast majority will believe you. Tell them the paint is wet, and they have to touch it to be sure." -- George Carlin

item.title: Katie add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Some people see the glass half full. Others see it half empty. I see a glass that's twice as big as it needs to be." -- George Carlin

item.title: Katie add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Frisbeetarianism is the belief that when you die, your soul goes up on the roof and gets stuck. " -- George Carlin

item.title: Katie add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Katie add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Argue for your limitations and, sure enough, they're yours." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Katie add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "In order to live free and happily, you must sacrifice boredom. It is not always an easy choice." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Katie add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Bad things are not the worst things that an happen to us. NOTHING is the worst thing that can happen to us." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Katie add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Here is a test to find whether your mission on Earth is finished: If youÂ´re alive it isn't." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Katie add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Katie add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Katie add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "Take no heed of her.... She reads a lot of books." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Katie add a quote by Joseph Brodsky
item.description: "There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them." -- Joseph Brodsky

item.title: Katie add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "If the real world were a book, it would never find a publisher. Overlong, detailed to the point of distraction-and ultimately, without a major resolution." -- Jasper Fforde
